comments.body:
Hmmmm. I wonder if this should  instead be

```
                    'actions': [{'resource': 'Connections', 'action': 'can_create'}],
```

It's clearer/simpler right now, I guess the question is if we might want to include any other properties in here in the future.

WDYT @mik-laj @jhtimmins ?
I first serialized it that way but I couldn't deserialize it which would pose a problem during Role creation with permissions

I prefer to use objects to make this API more future-proof.  This may also make it easier to use this API, despite appearances, because in strongly typed languages you will have a better type hint. You will be able to go to the class documentation and not just the description of the attribute.
